thread.section_title: The Ampersand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful, but small rooms
thread.title_full: Beautiful, but small rooms - Review of The Ampersand Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: julesbb29
title: Beautiful, but small rooms
text:
The hotel is beautiful, clean and with good service and great location. However the rooms are tiny! We very given a "returning-guests-discount" and was therefore given a suite, with the same price as a regular room, however this suite is no bigger than a such a room....
Rooms should be bigger, or price lower!
